body:
backport of #35782

#### PR description:

It was noticed in the [CMSHLT-2188]( https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2188) that the filter `DetectorStateFilter` is not working in Run3 data, likely because the DCS information from SCAL is not available. I provide here a fix to take instead the information from `DCSRecord` provided by the `OnlineMetaDataDigis` collection. 
I profit to add `fillDescriptions` methods and also to include header files in the same file as the plugin implementation.

#### PR validation:

It compiles.
